meta.description: Determine the optimal production plan to maximize the profit for the factory producing three types of products with specific equipment constraints.

sets.name: EQUIPMENT_A
sets.description: Types of equipment for step A

sets.name: EQUIPMENT_B
sets.description: Types of equipment for step B

params.name: processing_time_A
params.description: Processing time for each product on equipment A

params.name: processing_time_B
params.description: Processing time for each product on equipment B

params.name: available_time
params.description: Available operating time for each equipment

params.name: equipment_cost
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for each equipment

params.name: raw_material_cost
params.description: Raw material cost per unit for each product

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Selling price per unit for each product

vars.name: x_A
vars.description: Units of product processed on equipment A

vars.name: x_B
vars.description: Units of product processed on equipment B

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((unit_price[p] - raw_material_cost[p]) * (sum(x_A[a][p] for a in EQUIPMENT_A if processing_time_A[a][p] is not None) + sum(x_B[b][p] for b in EQUIPMENT_B if processing_time_B[b][p] is not None)) for p in PRODUCTS) - sum(equipment_cost[a] for a in EQUIPMENT_A) - sum(equipment_cost[b] for b in EQUIPMENT_B)
objective.description: Maximize profit by considering revenue from products minus raw material and equipment costs

constraints.name: time_constraint_A1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_A['A1'][p] * x_A['A1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_A['A1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_A2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_A['A2'][p] * x_A['A2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_A['A2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B1'][p] * x_B['B1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B1'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B2'][p] * x_B['B2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B2'][p] is not None)

constraints.name: time_constraint_B3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B3'][p] * x_B['B3'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B3'][p] is not None)
